example.name: autogen2
example.text: the economic and social resiliency of the San Francisco Bay area and the outstanding work of the local governments and the private charitable organizations there as metaphors for the supremacy of whatever failed system Mr. Cockburn now believes in

for the supremacy of whatever failed system Mr. Cockburn now believes in
